unnormalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Ticket to Cracking Those Exams!
normalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Ticket to Cracking Those Exams!

unnormalised: Ed-Tech is buzzing, folks, and exam prep apps are leading the charge! Forget late-night study sessions fuelled by chai and anxiety. These apps, packed with practice tests and bite-sized lessons, are changing the game.
normalised: Ed-Tech is buzzing, folks, and exam prep apps are leading the charge! Forget late-night study sessions fueled by chai and anxiety. These apps, packed with practice tests and bite-sized lessons, are changing the game.

unnormalised: From cracking the IIT-JEE to acing those SSC exams, there's an app for almost everything. Think personalized learning paths, instant doubt-solving, and mock tests that mimic the real deal.
normalised: From cracking the I I T-J E E to acing those S S C exams, there's an app for almost everything. Think personalized learning paths, instant doubt-solving, and mock tests that mimic the real deal.

unnormalised: VidyaMandir Classes (VMC) has even launched its own app! Students are loving the convenience, especially around festival time. Forget stressing about exams during Onam celebrations – you can squeeze in some practice while waiting for the biryani to be served!
normalised: VidyaMandir Classes (V M C) has even launched its own app! Students are loving the convenience, especially around festival time. Forget stressing about exams during Onam celebrations – you can squeeze in some practice while waiting for the biryani to be served!

unnormalised: Experts say these apps are leveling the playing field, giving students in smaller towns access to quality resources they might not otherwise have. But remember, it's all about balance. Don't ditch the textbooks completely! Think of the app as your trusty sidekick in this exam adventure. It can easily help you achieve that 90% in your CBSE exams. Good luck!
normalised: Experts say these apps are leveling the playing field, giving students in smaller towns access to quality resources they might not otherwise have. But remember, it's all about balance. Don't ditch the textbooks completely! Think of the app as your trusty sidekick in this exam adventure. It can easily help you achieve that ninety percent in your C B S E exams. Good luck!
